data.name: The Circle Of Suffering
data.detailed_description:
Interesting Facts

1. Our development team consists of a programmer, a game designer, a modeller, a composer and a PR&SMM-manager, and the age of all team members together is 85 years .
2. Initially, this game was developed within the framework of Ludum Dare 48.
[[b]3.[/b] The name of the studio DEGRADE OTRYAD Studio comes from the of the same name discord server DEGROD OTRYAD Server.
4. This is our first game that we release on Steam.


Our Discord Server

If you want to chat with the developers of the game or just have a good time, you can join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/ZmZEWRfdh9


For Media

If you have a suggestion for our studio and you would like to contact us, then write to the email: kalyakindostudio@gmail.com


About the Game

This game is a psychological horror in which the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar house and must pass all the levels by solving puzzles. Puzzles are miniature tests of finding objects and comparing facts to solve the main problem - opening the door leading to the next level, deeper into the ground and the depths of the character's consciousness. At the same time, the player will be frightened by frightening sounds and an oppressive atmosphere.

data.short_description: This game is a psychological horror in which the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar house and must pass all the levels by solving puzzles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 60fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: With 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 4k 60 fps / SSD Recommended
